title: WTB - T213-1 Chase (Port, Throwing) and Cree
author: TistaT202

posts.post_title: WTB - T213-1 Chase (Port, Throwing) and Cree
posts.post_content:
Now that I knocked off my T213-2 NY American run, I would like to focus on the remaining T213-1 NYA cards I need (I'll leave the T213-3 for last).  If anyone has and is willing to part with the following, please let me know via a PM:

Chase Portrait
Chase Throwing
Cree

Thanks
Mike

Good luck on the chase's, I owned them both now long gone! Very difficult cards best of luck.

Danny
Thanks Danny.  I don't expect to get any PM's soon on this request:(...It will be fun tracking these down though.  The thrill is in the chase (no pun intended)!

Good luck with the hunt, its a tough one....if you find a nicer example this one could be all yours :rolleyes::D

[IMG]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3777/10860337745_e2da2f9c46_z_d.jpg[/IMG]

just a bump. missed the Chase that just sold on eBay...the hunt continues.

Thanks
Mike
